title: Renovated 1-BR, Union Sq. Somerville, $2000, inc. heat, NO FEE!
posting_body: ['Available for September 1, this updated one-bedroom unit offers a combination of period detail and modern conveniences.', 'Located in a National Register historic property on Prospect Hill, this apartment is five minutes from Union Square bus connections and the Green Line, and equally convenient to Harvard, Davis, Porter, Central, Kendall, Lechmere, and Sullivan Squares.', 'Easy on-street parking.', 'Laundry in building.', 'Rent is $2,000 a month and includes heat, gas and hot water.', "Asking first month's rent, last month's rent, plus security deposit.", 'No pets, no smoking/vaping/marijuana.', 'Features:', '-Large bedroom and living room, kitchen, and bath', '-Updated kitchen, with quartz countertops and newer appliances (gas range, built-in microwave, fridge)', '-Renovated modern bathroom', '-Updated wiring', '-Refinished wood floors (pine and oak)', '-Views of downtown Boston', '-Deck access', '-Great, safe neighborhood with restaurants, takeout, specialty shops, grocery, post office, library, Bow Street Market']
